title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Thad, expanding on the fact that Iowa’s book ban demonstrates hatred of LGBTQ people: Or women. Denying information on the HPV vaccine is more inline with the notion that women who are sexually active deserve to get STDs. In second place, it’s Toom1275 responding […]
